description:
Yoshino finally decides to go to school in a boys` uniform.  While she`s embarrassed by the way everyone else reacts, she feels somewhat relieved.  However, Shuichi is secretly envious of her...  Meanwhile, Shuichi is unable to refuse the request of Doi, who fell in love with Yuki-san at first sight, so he takes Doi to meet Yuki-san.  Doi is surprised to learn that Yuki-san used to be a man, but at the same time, he becomes interested in seeing Shuichi dress up as a girl.  The next day, Doi asks Shuichi to dress up as a girl for him...
Source: crunchyroll
